trends: There have been no other sightings in Haverstraw
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Looked like a full moon too low and in a never seen before position.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw what appeared to be a full moon near the mountain.I watched it slowly rise up go over the mountain then slowly descend.This all happen in ten minutes. I was watching my clock.It was five minutes to two when I noticed it moving and five minutes after two am when It was gone.I. remember It was a very cold winter night.I always no matter what time it is look in the sky since i was a kid. And I am sure the moon is never where I saw it that night.That is why I took notice and observed what I did. I was completely shocked and figured no one would believe this.I'm not absolutely sure of the day but absolutely sure of every thing else.I got up to use the lavatory.Before returning to bed I stopped to look through the window.That is when I saw what I saw.I know it was not a full moon so I can only speculate what it may have been.
